Class InputListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.InputListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class InputListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The subject of observation for the client GUI and notifies the client GUI of any changes that occur during the run of the program.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Casey, Karman
